name: Meet girls
description:
You are the guest of the modern bar.
The main way of the game is that you can walk freely in the bar and watch the pole dance in the middle of the dance floor.
Main functions of the game:
Here you can choose to invite every girl, tip them, and they dance for you. Money in the game will automatically increase over time.
If you're willing to tip three times, you'll enjoy a private solo show.
Main features of the game:
1。 Strong music
2。 Beautiful little sister
3。 From the perspective of the first person, you can enjoy everything at close range
